entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Baccaro Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baccaro Point 07:00 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023
Temperature: -2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -4.9°C
Wind: NNW 25 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning in the morning. Blowing snow late in the afternoon. Amount 15 cm except 5 cm inland. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then northeast 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023
